document.discussion_title: Phillips 66 Partners LP (NASDAQ:PSXP) Given Average Recommendation of “Buy” by Brokerages
document.topic_text: Tweet Phillips 66 Partners LP (NASDAQ:PSXP) has been given an average rating of “Buy” by the fourteen brokerages that are currently covering the firm, MarketBeat reports . Four equities research analysts have rated the stock with a hold recommendation and ten have issued a buy recommendation on the company. The average twelve-month target price among brokerages that have issued a report on the stock in the last year is $71.44. PSXP has been the subject of a number of analyst reports. Zacks Investment Research upgraded shares of Phillips 66 Partners from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating and set a $61.00 price objective for the company in a research note on Sunday, January 10th. Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group initiated coverage on shares of Phillips 66 Partners in a research note on Wednesday, January 20th. They issued a “neutral” rating for the company. TheStreet upgraded shares of Phillips 66 Partners from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating in a research note on Tuesday, February 16th. Finally, Morgan Stanley initiated coverage on shares of Phillips 66 Partners in a research note on Thursday, February 25th. They issued an “overweight” rating and a $69.00 price objective for the company. Several hedge funds and institutional investors have recently modified their holdings of the stock. Diversified Trust Co boosted its position in shares of Phillips 66 Partners by 6.0% in the fourth quarter. Diversified Trust Co now owns 16,030 shares of the company’s stock worth $984,000 after buying an additional 902 shares in the last quarter. Spirit of America Management boosted its position in shares of Phillips 66 Partners by 38.6% in the fourth quarter. Spirit of America Management now owns 99,353 shares of the company’s stock worth $6,100,000 after buying an additional 27,650 shares in the last quarter. Duff & Phelps Investment Management Company purchased a new position in shares of Phillips 66 Partners during the fourth quarter worth approximately $5,219,000. Hollencrest Securities purchased a new position in shares of Phillips 66 Partners during the fourth quarter worth approximately $626,000. Finally, Taylor Wealth Management Partners boosted its position in shares of Phillips 66 Partners by 1.1% in the fourth quarter. Taylor Wealth Management Partners now owns 78,915 shares of the company’s stock worth $4,845,000 after buying an additional 845 shares in the last quarter. Shares of Phillips 66 Partners ( NASDAQ:PSXP ) traded down 0.13% during midday trading on Monday, reaching $61.75. 364,658 shares of the company were exchanged. The stock’s 50-day moving average price is $60.81 and its 200-day moving average price is $58.56. The company has a market capitalization of $5.09 billion and a PE ratio of 32.62. Phillips 66 Partners has a 52-week low of $40.00 and a 52-week high of $76.95. Phillips 66 Partners (NASDAQ:PSXP) last issued its quarterly earnings data on Friday, January 29th. The company reported $0.61 earnings per share for the quarter, topping the Zacks’ consensus estimate of $0.53 by $0.08. The firm earned $103 million during the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $94.83 million. Analysts anticipate that Phillips 66 Partners will post $2.65 EPS for the current year. The company also recently declared a quarterly dividend, which will be paid on Thursday, May 12th. Stockholders of record on Tuesday, May 3rd will be given a dividend of $0.458 per share. The ex-dividend date is Friday, April 29th. This represents a $1.83 dividend on an annualized basis and a dividend yield of 2.97%. Phillips 66 Partners LP owns, operates, develops and acquires fee-based crude oil, refined petroleum product and natural gas liquids ( NASDAQ:PSXP ) pipelines, terminals and other transportation and midstream assets. The Company’s assets consist of crude oil and refined petroleum product pipeline, terminal, rail rack and storage systems in the Central, Gulf Coast, Atlantic Basin and Western regions of the United States. Receive News & Ratings for Phillips 66 Partners LP Phillips 66 Partners LP
